Text:
This video IS NOT 1280 x 720. The resolution is 960 x 540. Needless to say, its not exactly High Definition as the title suggests. Also, the file is 2.15 gigs, not 2.4. The rest of the information is correct. 
     This documentary is definitely worth checking out if you're into the Arcade Fire. I don't I'd watch it more than once, but it'd be cool to play against a wall from a projector as a piece of art during a party....
